reason.version: The server uses an incompatible version.
reason.username: Your user name was rejected. Maybe try a different one?
reason.userpassword:
The given password is incorrect.
The user name you have chosen requires a special one.
reason.username_in_use: The user name you have chosen is already in use.
reason.clientcert: The server requires you to provide a client certificate which is not supported by this web application.

warning.title: Audio hardware mismatch
warning.body: Your audio device sample rate (%1 Hz) doesn't match the required 48000 Hz. You can still join without audio, but your microphone and speakers will remain muted.
warning.info: Audio is disabled because your audio device sample rate (%1 Hz) doesn't match the required 48000 Hz.
warning.hints_title: How to switch your device to 48 kHz

hints.item1: Windows: Right-click the speaker icon → Sound settings → More sound settings → select your device → Advanced → set Default Format to 48,000 Hz.
hints.item2: macOS: Open Applications › Utilities › Audio MIDI Setup → select your device → set Format to 48,000 Hz.
hints.item3: Linux: Use PulseAudio Volume Control (pavucontrol) or system audio settings to choose a 48 kHz profile, then reconnect.
